Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Windfelder
Reviews.Content: This camera was one of the best items I've bought in a while. It was perfect for vacation as it is drop proof (we dropped it and it was fine), water proof (we took it under water and it was fine) and extremely easy to use. Highly, Highly, Highly recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Becky 01 "Becky 01"
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great photos from snapshots to more composed pictures.Only drawback so far is that the battery life is short when using the flash.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: cheated
Reviews.Content: My husband loves this camera! Took some amazing photos in Muai-both land and water photos. He is no stranger to cameras and has been delighted with this one!

Reviews.Title: It was perfect!
Reviews.Author: C. Hunt
Reviews.Content: Our daughter wanted this camera for her 25th birthday, finding this package with all of the accessories was PERFECT!  Took the camera to water the very next day and it was GREAT!  Takes great photos also!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: HottyToddy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after seeing a friends amazing snorkeling pictures from key largo made with this camera. I used it while riding motorcycles last weekend and it met all of my expectations. I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone. It is simple to use but still has plenty if options and features that allow you to enhance your shots.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: Lesley J. Schmidt "Lesley"
Reviews.Content: I owned this camera for 2 months and I took it with me to Hawaii.  The camera seems to work fine in the pool and low humidity areas, but stopped working in Hawaii.  First the camera lens started fogging up (on the inside so you can clean it) so all my pictures outside the water are foggy.  Then I took it in the water on the snorkel trip and then it completely stopped working.  I opened the sealed compartment and the SD card was wet.  Now I have been reading other people's reviews and the same things are happening to them.  I have a year warranty so I called Nikon.  Horrible customer service.  They make you ship the camera back to them (on your own dime) so they can determine if you broke it or if it is a manufacturer's default.  Then they will try to fix it and may charge me to fix it.  They said this could take over a month so I probably won't be able to use it again this summer and test out their fixes.  They are refusing to send me a new camera or refund my money so I can buy a different camera (looking at the Pentax).  Don't be disappointed like I was and avoid this camera!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: bobjr21w
Reviews.Content: Out of the box it was smaller then expected. I'm not an expert photographer but it does take some nice pictures. The one tripod is a nice additive.  I have not used it in or near water yet, so I can not say whether or not it will fry the first time it gets wet.  the features are east to use and quite similar to my 6 y/o Nikon.  I'm glad I got the kit and not just the camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: LCRD1
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera, and good price,  the only weak point is battery. altough having spare one. it last no more than 30 or 40 pics  per battery.  dealer must upgrade camera case to carry spare battery and charger

Reviews.Title: excellent choice it is.
Reviews.Author: ever1309
Reviews.Content: finally it arrived. Sorry for the suspect. everything your need all in this set. Now I can take photo under the water. And share it with a GPS location. what a wonderful device and application combination.
